channel.title: Least on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race
channel.description: Recent content in Least on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: Greece biscuit factory fire leaves at least four dead
item.description: A search is continuing for one person still missing after a blaze broke out at a biscuit factory near the city of Trikala.

item.title: At least 30 dead as severe winter storm coats US in snow and ice
item.description: Snow storm was set to become the costliest severe weather disruption with estimated losses between $105bn to $115bn.
